Package gov.tak.platform.widgets

Class AbstractWidgetController<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.platform.widgets.AbstractWidgetController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the model type in the Model, View, Controller design pattern
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPropertyBindingObject.OnPropertyValueChangedListener<IMapWidget>, IWidgetController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigWidgetController
    public abstract class AbstractWidgetController<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWidgetController, IPropertyBindingObject.OnPropertyValueChangedListener<IMapWidget>
    Abstract base for a widget controller with a specific model instance and property listening capabilities
